mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events (task_number, task_title, task_startDate, task_endDate) VALUES (task_seq.NEXTVAL #{task_title}, #{task_startDate}, #{task_endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT task_number, task_name, task_startDate, task_endDate, bigGoal_number, smallGoal_number FROM task_vo WHERE TRUNC(task_startDate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) -- Modify this condition as needed
